title: Mathematics-Interdisciplinary Integrated Instructional Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and understanding of basic instructional methods
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers focusing on designing activities that integrate mathematics content with other subjects (science, engineering, language, etc.) in actual classrooms. Learners utilize their experiences as working professionals (administrative/managerial roles) to engage in realistic lesson design.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can develop three or more themes integrating science/engineering/language elements into math lesson designs
Learners can present two or more evaluation criteria for interdisciplinary integrated classes and analyze application cases
Participants implement at least one interdisciplinary class activity using digital tools (apps, simulations, etc.) in a BYOD environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
